original_text: Let her not be as one dead, whose flesh is half eaten away when he comes out of his mother's womb.”
korean_text: 그가 살이 반이나 썩어 모태로부터 죽어서 나온 자 같이 되지 않게 하소서

sentences.original_text: Let her not be as one dead,
sentences.korean_translation: 그녀가 죽은 자 같이 되지 않게 하소서,

sentences.original_text: whose flesh is half eaten away
when he comes out of his mother's womb.
